content: A.B. Siddique A.B. Siddique (Muhammad Abu Bakar Siddique) Assistant Professor NLP | LLMs | Gen. AI | ML Zero-shot Learning | LLMs Interpretability Safe, Personalizable Conversational AI Here is my CV ab.siddique uky.edu Department of Computer Science Davis Marksbury Building, Room # 321 University of Kentucky Lexington, KY 40506-0633 Research Interest My research interests include natural language processing, information retrieval, and scalable data science. In particular, I investigate large language models and safe conversational AI systems, with an emphasis on zero-shot generalization, personalization, and interpretability. My research program is highly collaborative. I work with domain experts across diverse areas, including cybersecurity, software engineering, cyber physical systems, edge intelligence, spatial databases, and under-resourced languages like medieval Latin. My research has appeared in top venues such as WWW, SIGIR, KDD, S&P, and VLDB. I am looking for motivated and hard-working PhD students who are interested in LLMs/NLP to join my research group.
